adHeader: Nisha - Elegant & Professional Belly Dancer for Your Event
adDetails: http://www.nishabellydance.com From a simple bellydance performance to create an exotic atmosphere, to a wild and crazy audience-participation experience, 100% customer satisfaction is Nisha's mission! Whatever the occasion -- Corporate event, office lunch party, wedding, birthday, anniversary, bar/bat mitzvah, reunion, graduation, bridal shower, retirement, fundraiser, holiday, or other social event -- Nisha will tailor her belly dance entertainment and music to the clientele. Please send your event needs (date, location, etc.) to performer Nisha -- show contact info --call/text show contact info For more information (and videos!) please visit http://www.nishabellydance.com
